statements: SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_value = '100';
SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT description FROM consensus_parameters WHERE id > 3;
SELECT parameter_name, description FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%size%';
SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'block_size';
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_value > '500';
SELECT id, parameter_name, description FROM consensus_parameters ORDER BY parameter_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND parameter_value LIKE '%mainnet%';
SELECT parameter_value, description FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'network_type' ORDER BY parameter_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters;
SELECT param_name, param_type FROM consensus_parameters WHERE param_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT config_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM network_configuration WHERE setting_name LIKE 'database%';
SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters WHERE param_type = 'security' LIMIT 5;
SELECT param_name, param_type FROM consensus_parameters WHERE param_value > 100 ORDER BY param_name ASC, param_type DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration WHERE setting_value LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT param_value, param_name FROM consensus_parameters WHERE param_type = 'security' AND param_value < 50 ORDER BY param_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT setting_name FROM network_configuration WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY setting_name;
SELECT config_id, setting_value, last_updated FROM network_configuration ORDER BY last_updated ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_id = 1;
SELECT config_name, node_count FROM network_configuration ORDER BY config_id DESC;
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM consensus_logs WHERE config_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%factor%';
SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters ORDER BY parameter_id DESC;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_value LIKE '%example%';
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM consensus_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT config_name, node_count, replication_factor FROM network_configuration WHERE replication_factor > 2 ORDER BY node_count ASC;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM consensus_parameters JOIN consensus_logs ON consensus_parameters.parameter_id = consensus_logs.parameter_id WHERE log_time > '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM node_status
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM consensus_parameters ORDER BY parameter_name DESC
SELECT config_name FROM network_configuration WHERE node_id = 3
SELECT algorithm_name FROM algorithm_history WHERE algorithm_version LIKE '%v1%'

SELECT * FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_id = 1;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM consensus_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%size%';
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM network_configuration WHERE node_id = 100 ORDER BY config_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM node_status WHERE status IN ('active', 'offline');
SELECT history_id, algorithm_name, algorithm_version, DATE(update_timestamp) AS updated_date FROM algorithm_history WHERE algorithm_version = 'v2.0';
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm_parameters ORDER BY algorithm_name DESC;
SELECT id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM parameter_history WHERE old_value <> new_value;
SELECT cluster_name, node_count FROM cluster_configuration WHERE replication_factor = 3;
SELECT network_name, gateway FROM network_configuration WHERE subnet = '192.168.1.0';
SELECT node_name, node_ip FROM node_configuration WHERE node_status = true;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm_parameters WHERE algorithm_name = 'PBFT'
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM consensus_algorithm_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 50
SELECT node_name, node_ip FROM node_configuration WHERE node_status = true
SELECT * FROM parameter_history ORDER BY updated_on DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT cluster_name, node_count, replication_factor FROM cluster_configuration
